PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-00922010-01-26,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS to ensure that all enforcement partners in marine safety across Canada can effectively carry out their mandate at the beginning of the 2010 boating season. They replace several contraventions that are not consistent with the Canada Shipping Act, 2001, increase some fines that were out of date and, at the request of the City of Vancouver, designate as contravention the anchoring in False Creek without a permit. False Creek is immediately adjacent to much of the Vancouver-based activities of the 2010 Winter Olympic Games.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0015 Publication Date: 2010-02-17
